mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CART WHERE C_ID = #{c_id} AND C_OPTION = #{c_option} AND C_NAME = #{c_name} AND C_SIZE = #{c_size}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART(C_ID, C_NAME, C_TOTAL, C_PRICE, C_OPTION, C_SIZE, C_TOPRICE, C_IMG) VALUES(#{c_id}, #{c_name}, #{c_total}, #{c_price}, #{c_option}, #{c_size}, #{c_toprice}, #{c_img})
mapper.update: UPDATE CART SET C_TOTAL = #{c_total}, C_TOPRICE = #{c_toprice} WHERE C_ID = #{c_id} AND C_NAME = #{c_name} AND C_OPTION = #{c_option} AND C_SIZE = #{c_size}
